cert_keypair.description: Path to the private key used to sign the certificate. The RSA key, 3072 bits in length

nv_counter.description: Non-Volatile counter corresponding to the software version in the certificate

encrypted.description: Indicates whether encryption for the SW image enabled

image_table.description: A text file containing the list of SW image files to be processed (.tbl file generated by ModusToolboxâ„¢)
